# ğŸ¨ Fontstyles

[![NPM](https://img.shields.io/badge/Available%20On-NPM-lightgrey.svg?logo=npm&logoColor=DA291A&labelColor=white&style=flat-square)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/fontstyles)

âœ¨ **Fontstyles** is a lightweight npm package that makes styling your text a breeze. Whether you want to make your text **ğ—¯ğ—¼ğ—¹ğ—±**, _italic_, or go for something more unique like ğŸ…‚ğŸ…€ğŸ…„ğŸ„°ğŸ…ğŸ„´ğŸ„±ğŸ„¾ğŸ…‡, this package has you covered. Perfect for adding a personalized touch to your terminal logs, output messages, or any text-based content!

---

## ğŸš€ Installation

Get started by installing **Fontstyles** via npm:

```bash
npm install fontstyles
```

---

## ğŸ¯ Usage

Simply import the `fontstyles` module and apply any of the available styles to your text. 

```javascript
const text = require('fontstyles');

// Apply your desired style
console.log(text.bold("Make your text stand out!"));
```

---

## âœ¨ Examples

### ğŸ”¸ Thin Fontstyle

```javascript
console.log(text.thin("The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog"));
```

## ğŸ’¡ Available Styles

| Style              | Function               | Description                                    |
|--------------------|------------------------|------------------------------------------------|
| **thin(text)**      | ğ–³ğ—ğ–¾ ğ–³ğ—ğ—‚ğ—‡ ğ–²ğ—ğ—’ğ—…ğ–¾        | Makes the text thin and elegant.               |
| **bold(text)**      | ğ—•ğ—¼ğ—¹ğ—± ğ—¦ğ˜ğ˜†ğ—¹ğ—²           | Makes the text bold and strong.                |
| **italic(text)**    |  _italic_ style         | Slants the text for emphasis.                  |
| **underline(text)** | UÌ²nÌ²dÌ²eÌ²rÌ²lÌ²iÌ²nÌ²eÌ² Style | Underlines the text.                           |
| **strikethrough(text)**    | ~~Strike Style~~       | Strikes through the text.                      |
| **monospace(text)** | ğ™¼ğš˜ğš—ğš˜ğšœğš™ğšŠğšŒğš            | Applies a typewriter-like style.               |
| **fancy(text)**     | ğ“¯ğ“ªğ“·ğ“¬ğ”‚               | Bold and cursive for a classic feel.             |
| **bubble(text)**    | â’·â“¤â“‘â“‘â“›â“” Style         | Adds a playful bubble effect.                  |
| **italicBold(text)**| _ğ—œğ˜ğ—®ğ—¹ğ—¶ğ—° ğ—•ğ—¼ğ—¹ğ—±_        | Makes the text both italic and bold.           |
| **mono(text)** | ğŸ…‚ğŸ…€ğŸ…„ğŸ„°ğŸ…ğŸ„´ğŸ„±ğŸ„¾ğŸ…‡          | Transforms the text into a boxed style. |   
| **straightJacket(text)** | ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡­ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡¹ ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡¾ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡ª | A small font type of text. |
| **darkBubble(text)** | ğŸ…‘ğŸ…¤ğŸ…‘ğŸ…‘ğŸ…›ğŸ…” style | Adds a dark playful bubble effect. |
| **medieval(text)** | ğ”’ğ”« ğ”±ğ”¬ ğ”™ğ”¦ğ” ğ”±ğ”¬ğ”¯ğ”¶! | Old ye, Medieval. |
| **fraktur(text)** | ğ–‹ğ–—ğ–†ğ–ğ–™ğ–šğ–— style | Somehow, I feel back in time. |
| **chroma(text)** | ğŸ…²ğŸ…·ğŸ†ğŸ…¾ğŸ…¼ğŸ…° style | I wonder why it's called Chroma. |
| **classic(text)** | ğğ¡ ğ¦ğ²! | The classy-classic font. |
| **origin(text)**    | Original Style         | Reverts back to the original text style.       |

---

## ğŸ”„ Convert Back to Original Style

Want to revert your fancy text to its original form? Use the `origin(text)` function to reset any applied styles.

```javascript
console.log(text.origin("ğ–³ğ—ğ–¾ ğ—ğ–¾ğ—‘ğ— ğ’˜ğ’Šğ’•ğ’‰ ğ—ğ—ğ—‚ğ—‡, ğ’ƒğ’ğ’ğ’…, ğšŠğš—ğš ğ˜°ğ˜µğ˜©ğ˜¦ğ˜³ ğ–¿ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ—ğ–¼ğ—ğ–ºğ—‡ğ—€ğ–¾ğ—Œ."));
```

_Result:_
```
The text with thin, bold, and other font changes.
```
